pageContent: Introduction: The effects of intracavernous alprostadil injection (IAI), a primary treatment for post-radical prostatectomy (RP) erectile dysfunction (ED) (pRPED), on the sex life of women partnered with men who have undergone RP have received little attention.

metaData.source:
Editorial comment to 'Dissociation between patients and their partners in expectations for sexual life after radical prostatectomy'
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23294037/
